amendment.description: Amendment sought strike section 236 which prohibits funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the HUD "Equal Access in Accordance with an Individual's Gender Identity in Community Planning and Development Programs" rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 234 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to strike section 236 which prohibits funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the HUD "Equal Access in Accordance With an Individuals Gender Identity in Community Planning and Development Programs" rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A083) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 236 (Roll no. 400).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan amendment (A083) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 236 (Roll no. 400).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A083) offered by Mr. Duncan.
